blogPost.excerpt: How would you like to solve all the mysteries of your data in just seconds? Simply pick an AI-based Template and voila -- instant discoveries in front of you. Combine different Templates to look at your data from unlimited angles!
blogPost.body: How would you like to solve all the mysteries of your data in just seconds? Simply pick an AI-based Template and voila -- instant discoveries in front of you. Combine different Templates to look at your data from unlimited angles!
blogPost.title: Stormly 2.0 - Turn your data into insights with a single click 🤯
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 你想不想在几秒钟内解开数据的所有奥秘？只需选择一个基于人工智能的模板，瞧--瞬间发现就在你面前。结合不同的模板，从无限的角度观察您的数据!
localize.tagline: 一键将您的数据转化为洞察力 🤯。

localize.description: 你想不想在幾秒鐘內解開數據的所有奧祕？只需選擇一個基於人工智能的模板，瞧--瞬間發現就在你面前。結合不同的模板，從無限的角度觀察您的數據!
localize.tagline: 一鍵將您的數據轉化爲洞察力 🤯。

previous.excerpt: The UI Coach anonymous feedback platform allows UI/UX designers to post their work and receive feedback and critiques from other designers from all around the world. UI Coach helps you create better designs and grow your skills by allowing you to get the feedback you need when you need it most.
previous.title: UI Feedback - Free anonymous feedback  for UI/UX designers

localize.description: UI Coach匿名反馈平台允许UI/UX设计师发布他们的作品，并从世界各地的其他设计师那里获得反馈和批评。UI Coach通过让您在最需要的时候获得您所需要的反馈，帮助您创造更好的设计并提高您的技能。
localize.tagline: 为UI/UX设计师提供免费的匿名反馈

localize.description: UI Coach匿名反饋平臺允許UI/UX設計師發佈他們的作品，並從世界各地的其他設計師那裏獲得反饋和批評。UI Coach通過讓您在最需要的時候獲得您所需要的反饋，幫助您創造更好的設計並提高您的技能。
localize.tagline: 爲UI/UX設計師提供免費的匿名反饋
